data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Planken, Liechtenstein.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Planken, Liechtenstein

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Planken to agree with you and with one another.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 166 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Planken. Through your servants plant 1 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, move the 3 believers in the state of Planken to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Planken with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Planken, Liechtenstein. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Planken, Liechtenstein that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.section_summary:
the state of Planken, Liechtenstein has a population of 500.

We estimate Planken has 3 people who might know Jesus, 388 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 109 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 166 neighbors who need Jesus.
